option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[province= /crvs_birth_notification/address_encounter_province and district= /crvs_birth_notification/address_encounter_district and town= /crvs_birth_notification/address_encounter_town and phc= /crvs_birth_notification/phc_identifier ]

label.span: NIC number should be exactly 13 digits long
Birth date cannot be past today's date.

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /crvs_birth_notification/newborn_info/address_usual_residence/address_usual_residence_province and district= /crvs_birth_notification/newborn_info/address_usual_residence/address_usual_residence_district and town= /crvs_birth_notification/newborn_info/address_usual_residence/address_usual_residence_town and phc='uc') or town='na']

instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /crvs_birth_notification/newborn_info/address_birthplace/address_birthplace_province and district= /crvs_birth_notification/newborn_info/address_birthplace/address_birthplace_district and town= /crvs_birth_notification/newborn_info/address_birthplace/address_birthplace_town and phc='uc') or town='na']

label.span: Newborn father's age should be between 15 and 95 years.
NIC number should be exactly 13 digits long

legend.span: Is father`s address of usual residence same as permanent address?

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /crvs_birth_notification/parent_info/father_address_usual_residence/father_address_usual_residence_province and district= /crvs_birth_notification/parent_info/father_address_usual_residence/father_address_usual_residence_district and town= /crvs_birth_notification/parent_info/father_address_usual_residence/father_address_usual_residence_town ) or town='na']

label.span: Newborn mother's age should be between 9 and 55 years.
NIC number should be exactly 13 digits long

legend.span: Is mother`s address of usual residence same as permanent address?

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /crvs_birth_notification/parent_info/mother_address_usual_residence/mother_address_usual_residence_province and district= /crvs_birth_notification/parent_info/mother_address_usual_residence/mother_address_usual_residence_district and town= /crvs_birth_notification/parent_info/mother_address_usual_residence/mother_address_usual_residence_town and phc='uc') or town='na']

label.span: Number of times mother has been pregnant in her lifetime
Number of births cannot be greater than number of pregnancies.
Number of times mother has given birth in her lifetime
(Including this birth and any still births)
Newborn's weight should be between 500 and 5000 grams.
Gestational age of newborn should be between 20 and 45 weeks.
